author: The Current
description:
Watch Amythyst Kiah play a solo acoustic version of "Empire of Love"
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

Having broken through with her 2021 album, "Wary + Strange," Amythyst Kiah returns with her follow-up, "Still + Bright," released on October 25 of this year. While in town for a concert at the Parkway Theater in Minneapolis, Kiah visited The Current studio to play a three-song solo set of songs from Still + Bright, including this song, "Empire of Love."

Amythyst Kiah’s 2024 album, "Still + Bright," is available on @rounderrecords.

Musician
Amythyst Kiah – guitar and vocals

Credits
Guest – @AmythystKiah 
Host – Zach McCormick
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video – Derek Ramirez
Audio – Evan Clark
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
